name: Get Colombian Peso to USD Exchange Rate with Telegram Bot and AI Date Recognition

user.name: Juan Sanchez
user.bio: Experienced cloud solutions professional with a strong focus on Microsoft technologies, including Microsoft 365, Azure, Entra, and the Power Platform. Skilled in designing and implementing automation using Power Automate and PowerShell. Proven track record in sales, marketing, and delivering managed services for cloud environments. Passionate about digital transformation, AI integration, and streamlining business processes through low-code platforms.

description:
# üìå Request TRM (Colombian Peso to US Dollar exchange rate)

## üéØ Objective

Retrieve the TRM (Colombian Peso to US Dollar exchange rate) for a specific date provided by the user via Telegram.

## üîÑ Summary Flow

1. üì® **Telegram Message**  
   The user sends a text or audio message  to the Telegram Bot.

2. üß† **Date Extraction**  
   AI (OpenAI) is used to identify the date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

3. üìÖ **Validation**  
   If the date is in the future, the user is notified that it is not valid.

4. üì° **TRM Query**  
   The bot queries the open data API from the Colombian government.

5. üì• **Result**  
   - ‚úÖ If TRM data exists for that date ‚Üí The bot replies to the user.  
   - ‚ùå If not ‚Üí It searches up to 10 previous days for available data.

6. üì§ **Final Response**  
   The most recent available value is sent, or a message indicating no information is available.

## üîó Data Source

**datos.gov.co** ‚Äì [TRM](https://www.datos.gov.co/)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).

nodes.name: Once a Telegram Message is received
Validate if Date is in the past

parameters.content:
## Reason for Loop
Some TRM are valid for several days, like during weekends or holidays, so 10 days are validated to grab the last available TRM

# üìå Workflow: Request TRM (Representative Market Rate)

## üéØ Objective

Retrieve the TRM (Colombian Peso to US Dollar exchange rate) for a specific date provided by the user via Telegram.

## üîÑ Summary Flow

1. üì® **Telegram Message**  
   The user sends a text or audio to a Telegram Bot.

2. üß† **Date Extraction**  
   AI (OpenAI) is used to identify the date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

3. üìÖ **Validation**  
   If the date is in the future, the user is notified that it is not valid.

4. üì° **TRM Query**  
   The bot queries the open data API from the Colombian government.

5. üì• **Result**  
   - ‚úÖ If TRM data exists for that date ‚Üí The bot replies to the user.  
   - ‚ùå If not ‚Üí It searches up to 10 previous days for available data.

6. üì§ **Final Response**  
   The most recent available value is sent, or a message indicating no information is available.

## üîó Data Source
**datos.gov.co** ‚Äì [TRM](https://www.datos.gov.co/)
